description_for_human: Research profile of Milos Vujasinovic, Ph.D. candidate at EPFL specializing in decentralized machine learning and privacy-preserving systems.
description_for_model: Access information about Milos Vujasinovic's research in decentralized machine learning, privacy-preserving ML, federated learning, and secure aggregation. Retrieve publication list, contact information, and research interests. Use when users ask about: decentralized ML research, EPFL researchers, privacy-preserving machine learning, federated learning systems, or Milos Vujasinovic specifically.
